data.title: Binarized Neural Network (BNN) and Its Implementation in Machine Learning
data.description: Binarized Neural Network (BNN) comes from a paper by Courbariaux, Hubara, Soudry, El-Yaniv and Bengio from 2016. It introduced a new method to train neural networks, where weights and activations are binarized at train time, and then used to compute the gradients.  This way, memory size is reduced, and bitwise operations improve the power efficiency.…
